main.Header1: The World's First Crypto Sensation from the Andes
main.Header2: Dive into a cryptocurrency that merges adventure and nature. Enjoy the security and stability of a blockchain inspired by the Andes.
main.iAgree: By pressing I agree, that I have read in full and accept the Terms and Conditions and Accompanying Documents in theirs entirety. I'm 18 years old and not a resident of Prohibited Jurisdictions.
main.whatIsBitcoinlamasDescription: In a world where cryptocurrencies have emerged as the modern-day gold rush, a unique breed of digital currency has captivated the global audience: the Bitcoinlamas ($BLAM). Unlike any other form of digital payment, these coins are imbued with the essence of freedom, embodying the spirit of adventure and the relentless pursuit of discovery. It allows holders to:
main.allHoldersEnjoy: All holders who stake their $BLAM tokens in our smart contract can enjoy earning great passive rewards.
main.whyChooseBinanceNetwork: Why Choose Binance Network for DeFi?
main.bitcoinlamasLeverages: Bitcoinlamas leverages the Binance blockchain, offering distinct advantages through its underlying technical characteristics.
main.binanceFaultToleranceDescription: Binance distinguishes itself through the utilization of tailored consensus mechanisms based on Byzantine Fault Tolerance to maximize network security and efficiency. These technologies, particularly implemented in the Binance Chain, promote swift transaction processing and enhance network reliability.
main.consensusMechanismsFastDescription: Binance provides customized consensus mechanisms to expedite transaction processing. These tailored solutions are offered exclusively by Binance to ensure swift and reliable transactions. Explore more on our website.
main.globalNetworkEffectDescription: As scaling solutions continue to evolve, Binance's optimized trading mechanisms and transaction processing protocols offer faster confirmation times compared to congested networks such as Ethereum.
main.provenSecurityModelDescription: With over a decade of operation, Bitcoin's security model has been extensively tested and validated, offering a more reliable and mature environment for financial applications.
main.yearHeader: Follow the Lamas ü¶ô find your Crypto Karma
main.inspiredByDescription: Lama Luminoso revealed that the Bitcoinlamas were more than just a digital currency; they were a symbol of harmony between the realms of technology and nature.
main.faqIntro: Need a hand? Our friendly Lamas are here to assist! Get in touch with our support teams via any of our social channels. While you wait, take a look at some of our Frequently Asked Questions
main.restrictedCountriesTitle: Which countries are restricted to participate in the sale?
main.restrictedCountriesAnswer: Regrettably, we are unable to accept participants from the following countries: Democratic People‚Äôs Republic of Korea, Cuba, Syria, Iran, Sudan, Crimea, People‚Äôs Republic of China, Bahamas, Botswana, Burundi, Cambodia, Central African Republic, The Democratic Republic of the Congo, C√¥te d‚ÄôIvoire, Cuba, Ethiopia, Ghana, Islamic Republic of Iran, Iraq, Libya, Mali, Myanmar, Somalia, South Sudan, Sri Lanka, Sudan, Syrian Arab Republic, Trinidad and Tobago, Bolivarian Republic of Venezuela, Yemen, and Zimbabwe.
main.claimingBlamAnswer: Participants will have the ability to claim coins on the Binance Smart Chain (BSC) network. It is important to note that manual withdrawal from the platform will be necessary. Listing procedures will commence following the conclusion of the Presale.
main.numberOfRoundsAnswer: We have dedicated allocation of 40% specially for presale. We will have 10 presale rounds (phases). Unsold tokens will be refunded.
main.priceTableHeader: What price I can expect for each round?
main.disclaimerText: Disclaimer: Cryptocurrency may be unregulated in your jurisdiction. The value of cryptocurrencies may go down as well as up. Profits may be subject to capital gains or other taxes applicable in your jurisdiction.
main.tradeText: Directly trade tokens using Binance, eliminating the need for wrapped assets and expensive Ethereum fees.
main.liquidityPoolsText: Set up liquidity pools and secure rewards by providing liquidity to the network.
main.launchText: Discover and participate in new token projects built on the Binance network.
main.transparencyText: Enjoy a secure and transparent trading experience powered by the Binance Network.

terms.paragraph1: Please read these General Terms and Conditions carefully as they affect your obligations and legal rights. If you do not agree with these General Terms and Conditions, please refrain from purchasing $BLAM tokens. If you have any questions regarding this agreement, please contact Bitcoinamdas via our website at
terms.paragraph2: Please note that Bitcoinlamas is currently conducting a legal and regulatory analysis of the functionality of $BLAM tokens. Following the conclusion of this analysis, we may decide to amend the intended functionality of $BLAM tokens to ensure compliance with any legal or regulatory requirements to which we are subject. This could directly affect your rights or obligations under this agreement. We will post a notice on our website at www.bitcoinlamas.io about any changes we decide to make to the functionality of the tokens, and it is your responsibility to regularly check our website for such notices. Upon conclusion of this analysis, we will decide whether or not to change the functionality of the tokens. These terms have not been registered under the Securities Act of 1933, as amended, or under any state or foreign securities laws. These terms may not be offered, sold, or otherwise transferred, pledged, or hypothecated except as permitted under the Act and applicable state and foreign securities laws pursuant to an effective registration statement or an exemption therefrom.
terms.paragraph3: These terms and any other document or material in connection with the offer or sale, or invitation for subscription or purchase of $BLAM tokens may not be circulated or distributed, nor may $BLAM tokens be offered and sold, or be made the subject of an invitation for subscription or purchase, directly or indirectly, to the public or any member of the public in the USA, Canada, China, and other prohibited jurisdictions as defined in these terms.
terms.paragraph4: Purchasers should carefully consider whether a purchase of the tokens is suitable in light of their own personal circumstances. Bitcoinlamas does not accept users from countries or territories where its token sale activity must be specially licensed, accredited, or otherwise regulated. You are responsible for checking applicable law and fully responsible for any negative impacts arising from your country of residence's regulations. If you are traveling to any of these countries, you acknowledge that our services may be unavailable and/or blocked in such countries.
terms.paragraph5: These General Terms and Conditions constitute a legally binding agreement between you and Bitcoinlamas. By using our website and/or purchasing $BLAM tokens, you acknowledge that you have fully read, understood, and irrevocably accepted these Terms. If any participant does not agree with these Terms in whole or in part, such participant should refrain from purchasing $BLAM.
terms.definitionsDescription1: 1. The following definitions and rules of interpretation apply in these Terms:
terms.definitionsText1: These Terms and any other rules, policies, or procedures that may be issued by Bitcoinlamas and published from time to time on the Website (including the Accompanying Documents).
terms.definitionsAccompanyingDocumentsDescript: Other $BLAM Token Sale regulatory documents accompanying and detailing these Terms, being an inalienable part hereof and published on the Website (including, but not limited to the $BLAM Privacy Policy, etc). In case of any discrepancies between Accompanying Documents and the Terms, the latter shall apply. White Paper and information on the Website are not considered as any type of Accompanying documents and provided only as descriptive information about the project unless otherwise stated in these Terms or in any other accompanying documents.
terms.definitionsAffiliateDescription1: Any person or entity that has any relation to us, including, but not limited to partners, employees, agents, and contractors.
terms.definitionsApplicableLawDescription1: Law applicable under these Terms to any and all relations between a Participant and Bitcoinlamas. Defined in accordance with provisions of the clause 29 of these Terms.
terms.definitionsDissolutionEventDescription1: Means (i) a voluntary termination of operations, (ii) a general assignment for the benefit of Bitcoinlamas‚Äô creditors, or (iii) any other liquidation, dissolution, or winding up of Bitcoinlamas, whether voluntary or involuntary.
terms.definitionsBitcoinlamasPlatformDescripti: A revolutionary Decentralized exchange to be built on the blockchain network with exchanging, staking, and other features which will be developed by Bitcoinlamas or Affiliates subject to the successful conduct of the Token Sale and other conditions. Planned functionality of the future Platform can be found in the project‚Äôs White Paper. May also be referred to as the Platform.
terms.definitionsCryptocurrencyDescription1: Digital currency, represented by ETH (Ethereum), USDT (Tether), and USDC used by Participants to purchase $BLAM Tokens.
terms.definitionsIntellectualPropertyRightsDes: Any invention, patent, utility model right, copyright, and related right, registered design, unregistered design right, trademark, trade name, internet domain name, design right, design, service mark, database rights, topography right, rights in get-up and trade dress, rights in goodwill, or to sue for passing off and any other rights of a similar nature or their industrial or intellectual property rights owned or used by Bitcoinlamas in any part of the world whether or not any of the same is registered (or capable of registration), including applications and the right to apply for and be granted, extensions or renewals of and rights to claim priority from, such rights and all equivalent or similar rights or protections which subsist now or will subsist in the future.
terms.definitionsBLAMTokensDescription1: Digital cryptographic Tokens which are software digital products created by Bitcoinlamas as a cryptographically secured representation of certain rights for use of the Platform as described in Appendix A of General Terms & Conditions of $BLAM Token Sale.
terms.definitionsBLAMTokenSaleTitle: $BLAM Token Sale / Token Sale / Qualifying Token Sale
terms.definitionsBLAMTokenSaleDescription1: An offering of $BLAM Tokens to eligible Participants to purchase $BLAM Tokens during a limited period of time, according to the price as described in these Terms. Also referred to as the ICO.
terms.definitionsMaximumTransactionAmountDescr: The maximum amount of funds which may be transferred as consideration for Tokens from one Participant.
terms.definitionsMinimumTransactionAmountDescr: The minimal amount of funds which may be transferred as consideration for Tokens from one Participant.
terms.definitionsPurchaserDescription1: Any person, who purchases $BLAM Tokens. Bitcoinlamas reserves its right to set forth at any time upon its own discretion special eligibility or other requirements to certain Tokens Sale Participants for Tokens purchase during different stages of Token Sale.
terms.definitionsWebsiteDescription1: A group of interrelated websites owned and operated by Bitcoinlamas available in the Internet via address: www.bitcoinlamas.io
terms.definitionsUserDescription1: Any person, who uses the Website for reasons other than for purchasing the $BLAM Tokens.
terms.definitionsNumberingTermsTitle: 1. In the Terms, unless the opposite is clear from the context:
terms.definitionsNumberingTermsPoint1: ‚Ä¢ Unless the context otherwise requires, words in the singular shall include the plural and in the plural shall include the singular;
terms.definitionsNumberingTermsPoint2: ‚Ä¢ Unless the context otherwise requires, a reference to one gender shall include a reference to the other genders;
terms.definitionsNumberingTermsPoint3: ‚Ä¢ References to clauses and schedules are to the clauses and schedules of these Terms and references to paragraphs are to paragraphs of the relevant schedule;
terms.definitionsNumberingTermsPoint4: ‚Ä¢ A reference to any party shall include that party‚Äôs personal representatives, successors, and permitted assigns;
terms.definitionsNumberingTermsPoint5: ‚Ä¢ All references to a person include firms, companies, government entities, trusts, and partnerships or other unincorporated bodies (whether or not having separate legal personality);
terms.definitionsNumberingTermsPoint6: ‚Ä¢ The term 'including' does not exclude anything not listed;
terms.definitionsNumberingTermsPoint7: ‚Ä¢ A reference to a statute or statutory provision is a reference to it as amended, extended, or re-enacted from time to time;
terms.definitionsNumberingTermsPoint8: ‚Ä¢ A reference to a statute or statutory provision shall include all subordinate legislation made from time to time under that statute or statutory provision;
terms.definitionsNumberingTermsPoint9: ‚Ä¢ A reference to writing or written includes fax and email;
terms.definitionsNumberingTermsPoint10: ‚Ä¢ Any obligation on a party not to do something includes an obligation not to allow that thing to be done;
terms.definitionsNumberingTermsPoint11: ‚Ä¢ Any words following the terms including, include, in particular, for example, or any similar expression shall be construed as illustrative and shall not limit the sense of the words, description, definition, phrase, or term preceding or following those terms;

terms.definitionsParticipantEligibility: 1. A Participant is only allowed to purchase $BLAM Tokens if by buying Tokens he/she/it covenants, represents, and warrants that they are neither a citizen, resident, nor tax resident (hereinafter also can be jointly referred to as the ‚ÄúResident‚Äù) of the Prohibited Jurisdictions (including but not limited to the United States of America, Bolivia, Cambodia, Canada, Central African Republic, China, Congo, Cuba, Democratic People‚Äôs Republic of Korea, Democratic Republic of Congo, Libya, Syria, Iran, Iraq, Republic of Crimea, Yemen, Somalia, Sudan, South Sudan, and countries or territories or individuals under the sanctions of the United Nations or the European Union or OFAC). You also represent and warrant that You are not a citizen or resident of a geographic area in which access to or use of the cryptocurrency or Tokens, or where participation in the ICO is prohibited by applicable law, decree, regulation, treaty, or administrative act. We shall reserve the right to refuse selling $BLAM Tokens to anyone who does not meet the criteria set forth above.
terms.definitionsProhibitedJurisdictions: Residents of the Prohibited Jurisdictions are not eligible and not allowed to participate in the $BLAM Token Sale due to various taxation and regulatory issues. In order to buy Tokens and by buying them, Participant covenants, represents, and warrants that none of the owners of the company, of which Participant can be an authorized officer, are residents of the Prohibited Jurisdictions. Should this change at any time, Purchaser shall immediately notify Bitcoinlamas. Purchaser also represents and warrants that he/she/it is not a citizen or resident of a geographic area in which access to or use of the cryptocurrency or cryptographic tokens is prohibited by applicable law, decree, regulation, treaty, or administrative act. Purchasers cannot resell $BLAM Tokens to citizens and residents of countries and territories restricted in this Agreement.
terms.companyRepresentationsAndGeneralProvisio: COMPANY REPRESENTATIONS AND GENERAL PROVISIONS
1. By using this Website or purchasing Tokens each Participant covenants, represents, and warrants that (under the Applicable Law and law of the country of Participant‚Äôs residence):

2. He (she) is of an age of majority to enter into these Terms (at least 18 years of age), meets all other eligibility (has full legal capacity, power and authority to execute and deliver this Agreement and to perform its obligations hereunder, met other prescribed by the Terms requirements) and residency requirements, and is fully able and legally competent to use the Website, enter into an agreement with Bitcoinlamas and in doing so will not violate any other agreement to which he (she) is a party. This Agreement constitutes a valid and binding obligation of the Participant, enforceable in accordance with its terms, except as limited by bankruptcy, insolvency, or other laws of general application relating to or affecting the enforcement of creditors‚Äô rights generally and general principles of equity.

3. He (she) has necessary and relevant experience and knowledge to deal with cryptographic Tokens, cryptocurrencies, and Blockchain-based systems, as well as full understanding of their framework, and is aware of all the merits, risks (including but not limited to the risks described in Appendix B) and any restrictions associated with cryptographic Tokens (their purchase and use), cryptocurrencies and Blockchain-based systems, as well as knows how to manage them, and is solely responsible for any evaluations based on such knowledge.

4. If he (she) is a corporation, governmental organization, or other legal entity, he (she) has the right, power, and authority to enter into these Terms on behalf of the corporation, governmental organization, or other legal entity and bind them to these Terms and entering in agreements of such type do not contradict corporation‚Äôs/company‚Äôs charter or other internal documentation.

5. He (she) will not be using the Website for any illegal activity, including but not limited to money laundering and the financing of terrorism, and the funds used for the purchase of $BLAM Tokens have are not derived from any illegal sources.

6. He (she) is not a Resident of a geographic area or citizen of jurisdictions as specified in paragraph 3 hereof. By entering into these Terms and/or by acquiring the Tokens hereunder, the Participants represents and warrants that the Participants does not violate the laws of his/her country and the territory on which he/she is located. Bitcoinlamas may refuse from transactions with any person identified as a citizen or permanent resident of Prohibited Jurisdictions, and a Participant is not included in sanctions lists published by OFAC, FINCEN, issued by the country of Participant‚Äôs residency or not a politically exposed person.

7. The Participant is acquiring Tokens for its own account for purchasing, not as a nominee or agent, and not with a view to, or for resale in connection with, the distribution thereof, and the Participant has no present intention of selling, granting any participation in, or otherwise distributing the same (the Account is not transferable).

8. The Participant understands that he (she) bears sole responsibility for any taxes as a result of the matters and transactions that are the subject of this Agreement, and any future acquisition, ownership, use, sale or other disposition of Tokens held by the Participant.

9. The Participant understands that the distribution of Tokens may be considered subject to securities regulations in some countries (such as the US, for example), still, the offer of Tokens has not been registered with any financial authority and therefore shall not be resold except in compliance with applicable law (which may include the laws of Seychelles). Bitcoinlamas does not bear any liability for any possible current or future impossibility to use Tokens because of the aforementioned or any other possible restrictions.

10. The Participant understands, acknowledges, and agrees that Bitcoinlamas is not registered with the respective financial authorities and that Bitcoinlamas is not registered or licensed with any federal or state regulator as an investment adviser, broker-dealer, money services business, money transmitter, or virtual currency business, VASP-provider, or etc.

11. The Participant understands that the intended functionality of the Tokens may be changed in lieu of (including, but not limited to) regulatory approaches of different state bodies, risks mentioned in these Terms as well as not mentioned, failure to conduct a successful Token Sale and etc.

12. THE PARTICIPANT CONFIRMS, THAT HE (SHE) HAS NOT RELIED UPON ANY REPRESENTATION OR WARRANTY MADE BY BITCOINLAMAS, OR ANY OTHER PERSON ON BITCOINLAMAS' BEHALF, OR HAS NOT RELIED ON THE WHITE PAPER OR OTHER INFORMATION AS A BASIS FOR ENTERING INTO THESE TERMS.

13. The Participant hereunder expressly agrees that, to the extent allowable pursuant to Applicable Law, Bitcoinlamas shall not be held liable to and shall not accept any liability, obligation, or responsibility whatsoever for any change of the value of the Tokens.

14. By purchasing the Tokens the Participant represents and warrants that he (she) has read and understands the Token Sale General Terms and Conditions and all Accompanying Documents in full and he fully agree with the information about the functionality of Token described in Appendix A as for usage, storage, transmission mechanisms, and other material characteristics of the $BLAM Tokens, blockchain technology, Blockchain-Based software systems, and their risks, and appreciates the risks and implications of purchasing the $BLAM Tokens;

15. The Participant fully understands, realizes, and agrees that the $BLAM Tokens are created on a blockchain and are designed to be used in the manner described in Accompanying Documents. Participant agrees to accept the consequences of possible regulation of Tokens in the jurisdiction of Bitcoinlamas incorporation or others and agree to provide all documents requested from Bitcoinlamas in case of such regulation in order to comply with all requirements demanded from governmental bodies of the jurisdiction of Bitcoinlamas incorporation;

16. The Participant will not forge, or otherwise manipulate any personal or non-personal data requested by Bitcoinlamas in the process of the Participant‚Äôs registration (will not use VPN or other means of distorting the data), or after its completion, will provide all necessary personal or non-personal data in the form and format requested by Bitcoinlamas in the event when such necessity arises in connection with the requirements of anti-money laundering and 'Know Your Customer' (KYC) frameworks of Bitcoinlamas or in accordance with applicable law if any will be conducted. The same applies to the cases if and when Bitcoinlamas will be required to follow obligatory AML policies applicable in case it is needed.
17. The Participant shall purchase the allocation of Tokens in accordance with the established Maximum and Minimum Purchase Amounts, available on the Website (if any).

18. A Participant shall not use the Website if under the Applicable Law and/or law of the country of Participant‚Äôs residence he (she) is prohibited from using it. Any Token Sale Participant that is in any manner limited or prohibited from the purchase, possession, transfer, use, or other transaction involving any amount of $BLAM Tokens under the mentioned law should not access this Website and is prohibited from accessing, referencing, engaging, or otherwise using this Website.

19. Before using the Website and/or purchasing any $BLAM Tokens a Participant is obliged to read carefully any other Accompanying Documents that follow these Terms and regulate the Website usage and Tokens Sale procedure. The mentioned Accompanying Documents shall be regarded as an inalienable part hereof and their Terms of use shall be the same as of these Terms. By using the Website, each and any Token Sale Participant confirms that he (she) has fully read and understood not only these Terms but also any Accompanying Documents and fully accepts their conditions and rules.
20. These Terms are effective from the time You begin using the procedure of purchasing $BLAM Tokens or using a Website.

21. The Participant acknowledges and accepts that these Terms are subject to change, modifications, amendments, alterations, or supplements, at Bitcoinlamas‚Äô sole discretion. If such changes, modifications, amendments, alterations, or supplements will occur, Bitcoinlamas may inform You by publishing a relevant notification on the Website. Your continued use of the Website after any amendments or alterations of these Terms and/or the Website shall constitute Your consent hereto and acceptance hereof. In any case, the actual version of the Terms can be found on the Website.

22. The Participant acknowledges and accepts that Bitcoinlamas reserves the right, at its own and complete discretion and at any time to modify or to temporarily or permanently suspend or eliminate the Website, and/or disable any access to the Website for any reason. Bitcoinlamas reserves the right in its own discretion to deny any Participant from registration of Account and participation in the Token Sale (if registration is required).

terms.entireAgreementPoint1: 1. These Terms are intended to fully reflect the provisions of the original agreement between the parties and supersedes all prior or contemporaneous disclosures, discussions, understandings, and agreements, whether oral or written, between them. No provision of the Agreement shall be considered waived unless such waiver is accepted by the party that benefits from the enforcement of such provision by browsing the Website or purchasing Tokens. No waiver of any provision in the Agreement, however, will be deemed a waiver of a subsequent breach of such provision or a waiver of a similar provision. In addition, a waiver of any breach or a failure to enforce any term or condition of the Agreement will not in any way affect, limit, or waive a party‚Äôs rights hereunder at any time to enforce strict compliance thereafter with every term and condition hereof.
terms.severabilityPoint1: 1. If any term, provision, covenant, or restriction of these Terms is held by a court of competent jurisdiction to be invalid, illegal, void, or unenforceable, the remainder of the Terms, provisions, covenants, and restrictions set forth herein shall remain in full force and effect and shall in no way be affected, impaired, or invalidated, and the parties hereto shall use their commercially reasonable efforts to find and employ an alternative means to achieve the same or substantially the same result as that contemplated by such term, provision, covenant, or restriction. It is hereby stipulated and declared to be the intention of the parties that they would have executed the remaining Terms, provisions, covenants, and restrictions without including any of such that may be hereafter declared invalid, illegal, void, or unenforceable.
terms.applicableLawAndDisputeResolutionPoint1: 1. All questions concerning the construction, validity, enforcement, and interpretation of these Terms shall be governed by and construed and enforced in accordance with the laws of Seychelles (Applicable Law).
terms.applicableLawAndDisputeResolutionPoint2: 2. To resolve any dispute, controversy, or claim arising out of or relating to these Terms, or the breach thereof, it is agreed first to negotiate the issue in good faith for a period of not less than sixty (60) days following written notification of such controversy. If negotiations fail to solve the dispute, such dispute shall be referred to and finally resolved by the International Arbitration and Cryptography Centre Limited (hereinafter ‚Äì ‚ÄúIACC‚Äù) in accordance with the IACC Rules.
terms.applicableLawAndDisputeResolutionPoint3: 3. No Class Arbitrations, Class Actions, or Representative Actions. Any dispute arising out of or related to this Agreement is personal to You and Bitcoinlamas and will be resolved solely through individual arbitration and will not be brought as a class arbitration, class action, or any other type of representative proceeding. There will be no class arbitration or arbitration in which an individual attempts to resolve a dispute as a representative of another individual or group of individuals. Further, a dispute cannot be brought as a class or other types of representative action, whether within or outside of arbitration, or on behalf of any other individual or group of individuals.
terms.terminationAndSuspensionPoint1: 1. Notwithstanding anything contained herein, Bitcoinlamas reserves the right, without notice and at its sole discretion, to terminate these Terms or suspend the Participants' right to access the Website, including (but not limited to) in case of Participant‚Äôs breach of these Terms or if we believe You have committed fraud, negligence or other misconduct. All rights granted to the Participant under these Terms will immediately be revoked upon our termination of these Terms or suspension of Your access to the Website. These Terms will expire and terminate (without relieving Bitcoinlamas of any obligations arising from a prior breach of or non- compliance with this agreement and except clauses 22-26) upon either
terms.terminationAndSuspensionPoint2: 2. the issuance of Tokens to the Purchaser pursuant to these Terms or
terms.terminationAndSuspensionPoint3: 3. the payment, or setting aside for payment, of amounts due to the Dissolution Event occurrence.
terms.miscellaneousPoint1: 1. Any notice or other communication under the Terms shall be in writing and shall be considered given and received when sent by email or, if agreed, via respective messenger. The Participant‚Äôs official email for communication shall be deemed the email specified by the Participant during the registration.
terms.miscellaneousPoint2: 2. In case of required, Bitcoinlamas and its Affiliates may need to follow ‚Äúanti-money laundering‚Äù (AML), ‚Äúknow your customer‚Äù (KYC), and other government regulations in respective jurisdictions. Bitcoinlamas reserves the right to refuse if there is a reason to believe that completing such a transaction may result in the violation of Applicable Law or is contrary to acceptable practices as well conduct other actions mentioned in the Accompanying Document.
terms.miscellaneousPoint3: 3. Materials, such as White Paper and others, published on the Website or elsewhere, are not binding and do not ‚Äì unless explicitly referred to herein ‚Äì form part of these Terms and are of a descriptive nature only.
terms.miscellaneousPoint4: 4. The Participant will implement reasonable and appropriate measures designed to secure access to:
terms.miscellaneousPoint5: 5. any device associated with the email address associated with the Platform;
terms.miscellaneousPoint7: 7. In case the Participant suspects a security breach in any of the above-mentioned, he (she) will inform Bitcoinlamas immediately so Bitcoinlamas could take all required and possible measures to secure the Website, the Platform, $BLAM Tokens, and systems as a whole.
terms.miscellaneousPoint8: 8. The pages of the Website may contain links to third-party websites and services. Such links are provided for Your convenience, but their presence does not mean that they are recommended by Bitcoinlamas. We do not guarantee their safety and conformity with any of Your expectations. Furthermore, Bitcoinlamas is not responsible for maintaining any materials referenced from another site, and make no warranties for that site or respective service. Bitcoinlamas assumes no obligations in the event of any damage or loss, or any other impact, directly or indirectly resulting from the use of any content, goods, or services available on or through any such third-party websites and resources.
terms.appendixAOverviewOfTokensPoint1: 1. $BLAM Tokens carry no rights, expressed or implied other than those set out herein, subject to the successful completion and deployment of the future Platform. In particular, $BLAM Tokens do not represent or constitute any ownership right or stake, share, or security or equivalent rights or any right to receive future revenue shares with Bitcoinlamas, or any other form of participation in or relating to Bitcoinlamas. Intended functionality of the $BLAM Tokens include:
terms.appendixAOverviewOfTokensPoint1a: a. Making transactions on the Platform and outside it;
terms.appendixAOverviewOfTokensPoint1b: b. Staking Tokens on the Platform;
terms.appendixAOverviewOfTokensPoint1c: c. Using Tokens in the future liquidity pools;
terms.appendixAOverviewOfTokensPoint1d: d. Using Tokens for purchasing of the projects to be launched on the Platform;
terms.appendixAOverviewOfTokensPoint1e: e. Using as a tool of governance;
terms.appendixAOverviewOfTokensPoint2: It shall be noted, that depending on the results of the Token Sale and within frameworks of Bitcoinlamas' possibilities, some of the rights may become unavailable due to different circumstances, including risks, which are described in the Annex B of these Terms. Pay additional attention to the fact, that some of the rights may be granted upon the successful development of the exact Platform feature and Bitcoinlamas may be required to change the intended Tokens functionality in order to meet applicable regulatory requirements or due to other reasons. We do not guarantee, that Tokens will have the intended functionality in its entirety nor that they have any functionality at the moment of Token Sale.
terms.appendixAOverviewOfTokensPoint3: 1. $BLAM Tokens shall be distributed during the Token Sale event. Bitcoinlamas‚Äô publication on the Website is considered a legally binding offer of Bitcoinlamas to sell $BLAM Tokens (hereinafter referred to as the ‚ÄúOffer‚Äù). The Offer is deemed accepted since the moment of connecting wallet and sending any funds for the purchase of the $BLAM Tokens. Bitcoinlamas also reserves the right to sell Tokens on the basis of the respective individual token sale agreements or SAFTs.
terms.appendixAOverviewOfTokensPoint5: 2. $BLAM Token Sale (‚ÄùICO‚Äù / ‚ÄùToken Sale‚Äù / ‚ÄùQualifying Token Sale‚Äù) period or event is divided into the several rounds:
terms.appendixAOverviewOfTokensPoint6: Purchaser is not entitled to send any funds to purchase $BLAM Tokens until Tokens Sale period has officially begun. Purchaser is not entitled to send any funds to purchase Tokens after ending of the respective $BLAM Tokens Sale. Bitcoinlamas reserves the right to change the exact timing framework for the ICO unilaterally as well as any other conditions (Soft Cap/Hard Cap, Rounds, etc). Please refer to the information available on the Website for the exact timing of the Token Sale.
terms.appendixAOverviewOfTokensPoint7: 1. In order to purchase Tokens, the Participant is required to connect a wallet. User may be (in some circumstances) also required to provide some Personal Data, but only subject to the specific request of Bitcoinlamas.
terms.appendixAOverviewOfTokensPoint8: 2. After the successful wallet connection, You will be entitled to make a purchase by sending the desired amount of funds accepted as purchase consideration (‚ÄúPurchase Amount‚Äù) to the certain addresses, that can be viewed on the Website. The time for making a purchase shall be limited (‚ÄùPayment Period‚Äù) and Participant is strictly required to send a payment during the aforementioned Payment Period. In case if the Purchase Amount is not sent as it is prescribed, Bitcoinlamas will not issue Tokens to such Participant.
terms.appendixAOverviewOfTokensPoint9: 3. After the payment is made, we will check the status of the payment transaction. In case if we have any doubts regarding the transaction‚Äôs status, we may ask You to send us the transaction hash as well as other confirming information.
terms.appendixAOverviewOfTokensPoint10: 4. In case if the Purchaser fails to provide payment during the Payment Period as indicated on the Website, then Bitcoinlamas reserves the rights not to deliver Tokens and terminate these Terms unilaterally without any additional requirements or limitations.
terms.appendixAOverviewOfTokensPoint11: 5. Information regarding how we collect, store, transfer Your Personal Data (if any is required) can be found in the Privacy Policy, that is also published on the Website and is a part of the Accompanying Documents.
terms.appendixAOverviewOfTokensPoint12: 6. Prices for the $BLAM Tokens, as well as:
terms.appendixAOverviewOfTokensPoint12b: Tokens vesting policy (estimated Token‚Äôs delivery dates);
terms.appendixAOverviewOfTokensPoint12c: Tokens supply available for the sale under certain conditions;
terms.appendixAOverviewOfTokensPoint12d: Purchase Amount limits are available on the Website prior to making a Purchase.
terms.appendixAOverviewOfTokensPoint13: 1. Ownership rights for $BLAM Tokens shall be transferred from us to the respective Participant upon completion of the payment procedure by the Purchaser during the Payment Period and receiving of Tokens, but still may be subject to lock-ups and other conditions. It shall be noted, that the Purchaser may be required to follow different instructions to receive the tokens (such as making a claim or similar).
terms.appendixAOverviewOfTokensPoint14: 2. There will be in total 21.000.000 Tokens available (‚ÄúTotal $BLAM Tokens Amount‚Äù). Only 40% of them will be sold during the Token Sale. Bitcoinlamas does not plan to create additional $BLAM Tokens at any time after the initial Tokens release. Still, Bitcoinlamas reserves the right to change the Total $BLAM Tokens Amount subject to certain circumstances.
terms.appendixAOverviewOfTokensPoint15: 3. The applicable exchange rate for cryptocurrencies is set accordingly to the cost of ETH, USDT, USDC at https://www.binance.com/ at the closing price immediately preceding the date when the payment has been received by Bitcoinlamas.
terms.appendixAOverviewOfTokensPoint16: 4. Please be advised, that Offering of the Tokens will be available via Website or by us directly under individual SAFT agreements. Any other offers concerning Tokens Sale presented on any websites or internet resources shall be considered null and void and shall not put any obligations upon Bitcoinlamas (this provision may do not apply to personal or individual agreements, which Bitcoinlamas may conclude with certain Participants, conditions of which may vary from mentioned hereof).
terms.appendixAOverviewOfTokensPoint17: 5. $BLAM Tokens shall be distributed and vested in the following manner:
terms.appendixAOverviewOfTokensPoint18: 6. Bitcoinlamas reserves the right to an emergency stop functionality to stop the distribution process. Use of this functionality shall remain at the discretion of Bitcoinlamas and shall only be used in limited situations, such as, but not limited to:
terms.appendixAOverviewOfTokensPoint18b: b. serious network performance issue, depriving all users of equal treatment;
terms.appendixAOverviewOfTokensPoint18c: c. any type of material attack on the $BLAM Tokens, the Platform, Website or related networks.
terms.appendixAOverviewOfTokensPoint19: 10. The Purchases are final; thus, no refunds or cancelations are offered (as a general rule).
terms.appendixAOverviewOfTokensPoint20: 11. The Purchaser is obliged to provide valid proofs concerning the legality of his/her proceeds used to purchase $BLAM Tokens upon Bitcoinlamas' request or request of bank institutions or government authorities.
terms.appendixBOverviewPoint1: The Participant understands that $BLAM Tokens, underlined blockchain technologies, and other associated and related technologies are new and untested and outside of Bitcoinlamas' exclusive control and adverse changes in market forces or the technology, broadly construed, may prevent or compromise our performance under these Terms. Participant agrees that no other party may be held liable for any loss arising out of, or in any way connected with Participant‚Äôs participation in the $BLAM Tokens-sale, or receiving and holding Tokens or such risk.
terms.appendixBOverviewPoint2: In addition to the above, the Participant also acknowledges that prior to receiving Tokens he has been warned of the following risks, associated with the Website, the $BLAM Tokens, the Platform, the possible price volatility, and other relevant factors mentioned herein:
terms.appendixBOverviewPoint3ATitle: A) Legal risks regarding securities regulations
terms.appendixBOverviewPoint3A: There is a risk that in some jurisdictions the $BLAM Tokens might be considered to be a security, or that it might be considered to be a security in the future. Bitcoinlamas does not give warranties or guarantees that $BLAM Tokens are not a security in all jurisdictions. Each holder of $BLAM Tokens shall bear its own legal or financial consequences of Tokens being considered a security in their respective jurisdiction. Every Participant is bound to check if acquisition and disposal of $BLAM Tokens is legal in his jurisdiction, and by accepting these Terms, each Participant undertakes not to use $BLAM Tokens should their use not be legal in the relevant jurisdiction. If a Participant establishes that the use of Tokens under these Terms is not legal in his jurisdiction, You should not use the $BLAM Tokens, not acquire them, and should immediately stop using or possessing them if such case arises. Acquiring cryptographic Tokens for personal possession and exchanging them for other cryptographic Tokens will most likely continue to be scrutinized by various regulatory bodies around the world, which has so far given mixed reactions and regulatory impact. The legal ability of Bitcoinlamas to provide Tokens and support Platform in some jurisdictions may be eliminated by future regulation or legal actions. In the event it turns out with high degree certainty that $BLAM Tokens are not legal in certain jurisdiction, Bitcoinlamas will either:
terms.appendixBOverviewPoint3AOption1: cease operations in that jurisdiction, or
terms.appendixBOverviewPoint3AOption2: adjust Tokens and the Platform in a way to comply with the regulation should that be possible and viable.
terms.appendixBOverviewPoint3BTitle: B) Risk of unfavorable regulatory action in one or more jurisdictions
terms.appendixBOverviewPoint3B: Blockchain technologies have been the subject of scrutiny by various regulatory bodies around the world. The functioning of the network and Tokens could be impacted by one or more regulatory inquiries or actions, including but not limited to restrictions on the use or possession of digital Tokens like $BLAM Tokens, which could impede or limit their existence, permissibility of their use and possession, and their value. Also, such risks may arise in lieu of possible legislation updates of DAO, VASP providers, and etc.
terms.appendixBOverviewPoint3CTitle: C) Risk of theft and hacking
terms.appendixBOverviewPoint3C: Hackers or other groups or organizations may attempt to interfere with Your Third-party Wallet, the Website, or the availability of $BLAM Tokens in a number of ways, including without limitation denial of service attacks, Sybil attacks, spoofing, smurfing, malware attacks, or consensus-based attacks. You hereby agree that Bitcoinlamas shall have no liability for any such loss the Participant incurs.
terms.appendixBOverviewPoint3DTitle: D) Risk of security weaknesses in the Website and/or $BLAM Tokens source code or any associated software and/or infrastructure
terms.appendixBOverviewPoint3D: There is a risk that the Website and $BLAM Tokens may unintentionally include weaknesses or bugs in the source code interfering with the use of or causing the loss of Tokens.
terms.appendixBOverviewPoint3ETitle: E) Risk of weaknesses or exploitable breakthroughs in the field of cryptography
terms.appendixBOverviewPoint3E: Advances in cryptography, or technical advances such as the development of quantum computers, could present risks to cryptocurrencies, Tokens, the Platform, which could result in the theft or loss of $BLAM Tokens.
terms.appendixBOverviewPoint3F: $BLAM Tokens are unlike bank accounts or accounts at some other financial institutions and are entirely uninsured.
terms.appendixBOverviewPoint3GTitle: G) Risk of malfunction in blockchain
terms.appendixBOverviewPoint3G: It is possible that networks to which the Tokens are interacting with may malfunction in an unfavorable way, including but not limited to one that results in the loss of Tokens (the same risk applies to the blockchain to be developed).
terms.appendixBOverviewPoint3H: The Participant acknowledges that there are risks associated with using the $BLAM Tokens including, but not limited to, the failure of hardware, software, and Internet connections. The Participant acknowledges that Bitcoinlamas shall not be responsible for any communication failures, disruptions, errors, distortions, or delays You may experience when using the Website and Tokens, howsoever caused.
terms.appendixBOverviewPoint3I: Cryptocurrencies and blockchain are new and untested technology. In addition to the risks set forth here, there are risks that Bitcoinlamas cannot foresee and it is unreasonable to believe that such risks could have been foreseeable. Risks may further materialize as unanticipated.
terms.appendixBOverviewPoint3JTitle: J) Insufficient interest in Bitcoinlamas, the Platform, and $BLAM Tokens
terms.appendixBOverviewPoint3J: It is possible that Bitcoinlamas, Tokens, or Platform will not be used by a large number of individuals, businesses, and other organizations and that there will be limited public interest in the creation and development of its functionalities. Such a lack of interest could impact the development of the Platform and may result in great price volatility for $BLAM.
terms.appendixBOverviewPoint3KTitle: K) Tokens and the Platform, as developed, may not meet the Participant‚Äôs expectations
terms.appendixBOverviewPoint3K: The Platform is currently under development and may undergo significant changes before release. The Participant‚Äôs expectations regarding the form and functionality of the Platform and Tokens may not be met upon release of the new Website, deployment of the Platform, additional products and services for any number of reasons, including a change in the design, business model, and implementation plans and execution of the implementation of $BLAM Tokens.

privacy.statusAndAcceptanceTitle: STATUS AND ACCEPTANCE OF PRIVACY POLICY
privacy.statusAndAcceptancePoint1: 1. This Privacy Policy ('Policy') outlines the general rules for the collection, processing, distribution, use, and storage of Personal Data of Users and Participants by the Company during the $BLAM Token Sale event / ICO. Additionally, it includes some general procedures in compliance with relevant Anti-Money Laundering rules ('AML') if the Company is subject to them. IF YOU (USER, PARTICIPANT) DO NOT AGREE WITH THE PROVISIONS OF THIS PRIVACY POLICY, YOU MUST REFRAIN FROM USING THE WEBSITE OR PARTICIPATING IN THE $BLAM TOKEN SALE EVENT.
privacy.statusAndAcceptancePoint2: 2. Throughout this Policy, the term 'Personal Data' refers to information associated with a specific person (the Participant) that can be used to identify that person. This includes information about the Participant's activities, such as their use of the Website, time spent on the Website, and activities during visits, when directly linked to personally identifiable information. The Company does not consider Personal Data to include anonymized information or information that cannot identify a specific Participant.
privacy.privacyPolicyLegalEntity: The legal entity acting as the Personal Data Processing Company is Satoshi Lab Ltd, registered under the laws of Seychelles, company number 240961, with a registered address at Suite 1, Second Floor, Sound & Vision House, Rue Pierre De Possession, Victoria, Mahe, Seychelles.
privacy.statusAndAcceptancePoint3: 1. This Policy is an integral part of the General Terms & Conditions of the $BLAM Token Sale ('Terms'). In matters not regulated by this Policy, the General Terms & Conditions of the $BLAM Token Sale shall apply.
privacy.statusAndAcceptancePoint4: 2. The definitions set forth herein and mentioned with capital letters have the meanings described in the General Terms & Conditions of the $BLAM Token Sale.
privacy.statusAndAcceptancePoint5: 3. Each Participant must carefully read and comply with this Policy. By using the Website, checking the boxes during registration, or purchasing $BLAM Tokens during the Token Sale, the User fully agrees to and accepts this Policy. If any User disagrees with this Policy or any part of it, they must not access or use the Website or purchase $BLAM Tokens.
privacy.collectionProcessingAndUseTitle: COLLECTION, PROCESSING, AND USE OF PERSONAL DATA
privacy.collectionProcessingAndUsePoint1: 1. The purpose of collecting, storing, and processing Personal Data within the Company is to identify Participants of the Token Sale, among other purposes.
privacy.collectionProcessingAndUsePoint2: 2. Satoshi Lab collects Personal Data from the Website and uses Personal Data provided by Participants. When Users visit or use the products, the Company collects Personal Data sent by their devices. This includes IP addresses, device information, operating systems, and web log information. Location data may also be collected if using a location-enabled device, but such information is not released to third parties without consent.
privacy.collectionProcessingAndUsePoint3: 3. When Participants want to purchase $BLAM Tokens, the Company collects and stores the following types of Personal Data: wallet addresses.
privacy.collectionProcessingAndUsePoint4: 4. In certain circumstances, additional information may be required, such as names, emails, passport information, date of birth, and other information upon request. Such information will be requested individually, and Participants may be required to provide certified copies of documents.
privacy.collectionProcessingAndUsePoint5: 5. Basic Personal Data, as described in clause 8, must be provided before purchasing $BLAM Tokens. Personal Data described in clause 7 is collected even if the Participant only browses the Website.
privacy.collectionProcessingAndUsePoint6: 6. Failure to provide the required Personal Data may restrict the Participant from using the full functionality of the Website and purchasing $BLAM Tokens. In such cases, the Company bears no liability for incomplete use.
privacy.cookiesAndPersonalDataCollection: 7. When Users access the Website or use Company products or services, small data files called 'cookies' may be placed on their devices. These technologies are used to recognize Participants, customize the Website, measure effectiveness, and collect information about devices to mitigate risk.
privacy.necessaryDataCollection: 8. The Company only collects Personal Data necessary for Website use, Token purchase, or compliance with applicable laws. This includes administering the Website, personalizing it, identifying Participants, sending technical notices, communicating about products, monitoring trends, and investigating fraudulent activities.
privacy.soleDataControllerAndProcessor: 9. The Company is the sole data controller and processor, except when there is an objective need to involve third parties, subject to safeguards for Personal Data.
privacy.accessToReviewAndEditData: 10. Participants have access to review and edit Personal Data at any time and have the right to receive information about purposes, recipients, safeguards, and storage periods of their Personal Data. They may also request erasure, object to processing, request data portability, or demand restriction of processing.
privacy.publishingPersonalData: 11. Personal Data related to the purchase of $BLAM Tokens will not be published without explicit consent.
privacy.retentionPolicy: 12. Personal Data is gathered only as required for relevant services and is not processed for longer than required by law.
privacy.processingPersonalData: 13. Processing of Personal Data relies on contractual agreements, legitimate interests, legislative requirements, or consent.
privacy.securityBreachNotification: 14. In case of a security breach, attempts will be made to notify affected Participants electronically.
privacy.warningEmailsInCaseOfHighBreachRisks: 15. When breach risks are high, warning emails will be sent to affected users.
privacy.confidentialityMaintained: 1. The Company takes all necessary actions to maintain the confidentiality of Personal Data.
privacy.dataStoredAndProcessed: 2. Personal Data is stored and processed on Company servers in various jurisdictions. By submitting Personal Data, Users consent to this transfer and processing.
privacy.thirdPartyDatabases: 3. Third-party databases may be used to verify accuracy and confirm identity.
privacy.noSharingWithThirdParties: 4. Personal Data is generally not shared with third parties, except in certain circumstances such as mergers, legal requirements, or with User consent.
privacy.noSaleOrRentalOfPersonalData: 5. Personal Data is not sold or rented to third parties.
privacy.combiningInformationWithOtherSources: 6. Personal Data may be combined with information from other sources to improve Website features, content, and advertising.
privacy.linksToPartnerNetworks: 7. Links to partner networks, advertisers, and affiliates may be found on the Website, each with its own privacy policies.
privacy.informationStoredForRelevantPeriods: 1. Personal Data may be stored as long as necessary to provide services and resolve disputes. It may be retained beyond this period if needed to address future issues.
privacy.employmentOfSecurityMeasures: 1. The Company employs electronic and procedural safeguards to protect User-provided information from loss, misuse, disclosure, alteration, and destruction. However, transmission over the Internet is not entirely secure.
privacy.rightsToAccessCorrectUpdateDeleteData: 1. Users have the right to access, correct, update, or delete Personal Data, subject to compliance with relevant legal obligations.
privacy.reservationOfRightToModifyPolicy: 1. The Company reserves the right to modify this Policy at its discretion. The latest version is always available on the Website, and significant changes will be communicated via email.
privacy.collectionFromMinorsDiscouraged: 1. The Company does not knowingly collect personal identifiable information from children under the age of thirteen (13) without verifiable parental consent. Minors under the age of 18 are advised not to submit Personal Data without parental supervision.
privacy.inquiriesUnsubscribeRequests: For inquiries, unsubscribe requests, or further information on this Privacy Policy, please contact us.
